attributes.action: Acknowledgement of Mr Kenneth Dalglish for his conribution loyalty and support to the Hillsborough families together with his services to sport.
attributes.additional_details:
Responsible department: Department for Culture, Media and Sport

To officially acknowledge Mr Kenneth Dalglish for not only his services and contribution to Sport.But to also recognise his unstinting loyalty and work on behalf of the Hillsborough families during these past 22 years. This family man knows the heatbreak these families suffered and attended every funeral during this sad time.He is not only an excellent ambassador for Liverpool Football Club but more importantly for the communities and people of Merseyside
